answers.answer: I would get it checked.  I think the only time I gel something similar is when I has conjunctivitis (pink eye) other than that my eyes are sensitive to light when I have a migraine and that causes pain as well.
Have a history of dizzy spells but this is a new one for me. Awaiting call back from my doc

If its kind of spotty vision it may just be your body adjusting. At around 4 months I was at work in retail with all the big fluorescent lights and I could barely read the aisle numbers. It went away after about two hours. I went into optometrist the next say and she said it was common and just to take caution driving etc. If it happened again or became frequent to cone back but it never did. She's also expecting and has two kids and a similar prescription...
Thank you ladies. Seems to have passed just left with headache now. I do a lot of work in front of a computer so that provably doesn't help. Just gave me a fright
Have they checked you for diabetes I heard some people get vision issues when their levels get high.. I've never experienced that..
And check your blood pressure. I work with computers and I my eye sight its not as good as before becoming pregnant.
Thanks girls. I'm just 7 wks so done of that tested yet, will be in two weeks time. Spoke with my gp and she said it's migraine related pregnancy and nothing to worry about.

I had dizzy spells that started when I would drive at night and it would feel like the street lights were merging.I would pull over until I felt safe, it's gotten much better now.good luck to you and be safe! Xox

question: Hi guys,at work freaking out. Feels like someone is shining a torch in my eyes. Very strange sensation, more so in my left eye. Anyone had this before?
title: eyes feel blindling
